title: Do I get scuttler icon if I gifted myself
body:
I have a concern If I did self mysteary gify will I still get the Scuttler Icon? 
Thank you.

replies.body: Self-gifting through the gifting center is not currently possible, so that wouldn't work towards receiving the Snow Day Scuttler Icon.  If you don't want to gift anyone that's fine, there's still [lots of icons ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-crafting-2016)you can obtain!
I mean by sending a mystery Icon gift that's not in the gifting center the one you get it from - " store-> accessories-> summoner icons and then u can find the mystrey Icon )
Aha, you'll have to send a gift to a friend other than yourself to receive the icon.  Hope that helps clear things up!
Sent a gift today and I havent received the icon... Am I doing something wrong? Or does it take time to activate?

Icons like that usually have to be rolled out and distributed to eligible players.  The time that takes varies, and is sometimes after the event is over. If you don't get it right away, you may need to wait a bit.  I don't really have a specific ETA right now but I'll try and see if I can find what we're aiming for.
if u gift someone  an icon for the snowdown will uget the rift scuttler
